field.label: Show only delivery in weekend
field.comment: If set on Yes, normal parcel delivery will be hidden if weekend delivery will be available

field.label: Max cart weight
field.comment: The default value of 25 refers to the maximum weight of a package that Inpost delivers in kilograms. If you use a different unit, adjust this value and set the appropriate unit in the "Inpost - general configuration" section
